title: Update Footer social media links with actual URLs

requirements.text: Update the Footer component social media links section to use the actual URLs: Facebook link to https://www.facebook.com/share/14pG6fyhTk/, YouTube link to https://youtube.com/@brilliantcoachingcentre-hh6pj?si=YAroyIX3xHzTZABl, Instagram link to https://www.instagram.com/c.brilliantcoaching?igsh=YzljYTk1ODg3Zg==, and WhatsApp channel link to https://whatsapp.com/channel/0029Vb32rw8JENxvzIshPI1W

quotes:
Add 
Facebook:- https://www.facebook.com/share/14pG6fyhTk/
YouTube channel:- https://youtube.com/@brilliantcoachingcentre-hh6pj?si=YAroyIX3xHzTZABl
Instagram:- https://www.instagram.com/c.brilliantcoaching?igsh=YzljYTk1ODg3Zg==
WhatsApp channel:- https://whatsapp.com/channel/0029Vb32rw8JENxvzIshPI1W

acceptanceCriteria: Footer component displays four social media links with correct URLs
Facebook link opens https://www.facebook.com/share/14pG6fyhTk/ in a new tab
YouTube link opens https://youtube.com/@brilliantcoachingcentre-hh6pj?si=YAroyIX3xHzTZABl in a new tab
Instagram link opens https://www.instagram.com/c.brilliantcoaching?igsh=YzljYTk1ODg3Zg== in a new tab
WhatsApp channel link opens https://whatsapp.com/channel/0029Vb32rw8JENxvzIshPI1W in a new tab
All links maintain existing icon styling and bilingual label support
Links are clickable and properly formatted with target='_blank' and rel='noopener noreferrer'

constraints: Preserve existing Footer component structure and styling
Maintain bilingual support for social media link labels using LanguageContext
Do not modify other Footer functionality (CTA buttons, contact info, copyright)
Keep existing icon styling and hover effects for social media links
nonGoals: Adding new social media platforms beyond the four specified
Changing the visual design or layout of the Footer component
Modifying social media link behavior beyond updating URLs
Adding analytics or tracking to social media links
